name: Push
0:
”Alexa, turn on office TV”
”Alexa, set living lights to 10%”
”Alexa, turn off living lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill connects Alexa through your Push automation controller to provide voice control of your home automation system, powered by the Smart Voice automation engine.
This supports the PC1, PC2 and PC4 controllers, some features may not be available on all controllers.

Through simple voice commands, you can control individual devices, or set the mood with a scene. Some example phrases are;
"Alexa, turn on bedroom TV"
"Alexa, turn on bathroom lights"

Notice: To use this Skill you need to have a functional automated home with a PUSH automation controller with a Smart Voice License and Account, sold separately.

NOTE: This skill may not be suitable for people of all ages
